original_text: He shall not alter it, nor change it, a good for a bad, or a bad for a good: and if he shall at all change beast for beast, then it and the exchange thereof shall be holy.
korean_text: 그것을 변경하여 우열간 바꾸지 못할 것이요 혹 가축으로 가축을 바꾸면 둘 다 거룩할 것이며

sentences.original_text: or a bad for a good
and if he shall at all change beast for beast
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그가 짐승을 짐승으로 바꾸려 한다면

sentences.original_text: then it and the exchange thereof shall be holy
